title: Super Robot Taisen OG: The Inspector - Record of ATX
original_name: スーパーロボット大戦 OG -ジ・インスペクター- Record of ATX
sinopse:
It's been six months since the L5 Campaign, the conflict that pitted humanity and aliens with the whole earth sphere at stake. Now that the true threat is gone the remains from old conflicts that have kept discord among people from even before the aliens arrived have started to resurface and thus the fight is far from over...

(Source: MU)
